citizenship: Netherworld (a city of pre-cataclysmic Atlantis that is now located in Subterranea).
education: Educated by the Royal tutors of Netherworld
hair: (as a young women) Black, (as an aged woman) Grey-white
identity: The general populace of Earth is unaware of Kala's existence.
occupation: Queen of the Mole Man's domain Subterranea
powers: Kala is centuries old but remained young until recent times due to the unexplained effect of the atmosphere of the Subterranean Netherworld.
